title: [ScoreboardStats]为什么会报错
author: _Round
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lichi2050 于 2016-2-16 12:31 编辑 

 配置文件在这.我就是搞不懂那里错了. 


# Main configuration

# Compatible mode with other plugins like HealthBar, ColoredTags, GhostPlayer or McCombatLevel
compatibilityMode: true

disabled-worlds:
  - world_nether
  - city

# This will not count vanished players in the online value
hide-vanished: false

Scoreboard:
  Title: '&b&lFLY空城'
  # seconds
  # For instant updates you can or 1 and it will update every second
  Update-delay: 2
  Items:
    # The Title must have under 48 characters
    # Title: Type
    '&9&l在线人数': '%online%'
    '&6&l[round_star]你的F币': '%econ%'
    '&1&l[<3]你的延迟': '%ping%'
    '&4&l[X]杀人数量': '%kills%'
    '&d&l官方Q群: lichi2050飘过': ''
# Let ScoreboardStats track stats (kills, deaths, mobkills, killstreak) You need no plugin for this
enable-pvpstats: true

Temp-Scoreboard-enabled: false

Temp-Scoreboard:
  Title: '&a&lTop Kills'
  # %mob% | %kills% | %killstreak%
  Type: '%kills%'
  Color: '&9'
  # How many Players would be displayed
  Items: 5
  Intervall-show: 300
  Intervall-disappear: 300

pluginUpdate: true
随便告诉我 那一部错了. 谢谢

replies.author: _Round
replies.txt_content:
yangoo 发表于 2016-2-16 12:34
转码出错
就是UTF-8

replies.author: yangoo
replies.txt_content:
_Round 发表于 2016-2-17 12:34
就是UTF-8

用ANSI格式编码。。。。

用ANSI格式编码。。。。
